## Introduction

```{r }
base <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/geedoubledee/data698_research_project/main/data/allrecipes_df_pt_"
exts <- c("1.csv", "2.csv", "3.csv")
for (i in 1:length(exts)){
    url <- paste0(base, exts[i])
    df <- read.csv(url)
    if (i == 1){
        allrecipes_df <- df
    }else{
        allrecipes_df <- allrecipes_df |>
            bind_rows(df)
    }
}
remove <-
```
